name: deepsubx
description: DeepSubX is a subtitle translator that uses AI models to translate subtitles quickly and accurately into multiple languages. It supports various subtitle formats and a self-hostable web interface.

features.title: Ai Translation
features.description: Accurate subtitle translation using AI models. Professional quality output

features.title: Multi
features.description: Translate to dozens of languages. Global accessibility

features.title: Format Compatibility
features.description: Works with all major subtitle formats. Universal subtitle handling

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Quick translations for entire subtitle files. Save time on localization

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Simple browser-based translation tool. No software installation needed

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Process subtitles privately on your server. Complete data privacy
